catalog: L7 WAY ‚Äî Library of the Craft

items.name: L7 WAY Framework
items.description: The common language for MCP systems ‚Äî tool orchestration DSL with 7-dimensional Common Lingua, gateway architecture, flow engine, and entity registry. The philosophical and technical backbone of the entire Craft.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Gateway (gateway.js)
items.description: Universal MCP gateway ‚Äî direct MCP SDK integration for tool discovery, routing, and execution. The road through which all tool access flows (Law I).
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Parser (parser.js)
items.description: L7 flow DSL parser ‚Äî validates, parses, and lists tool and flow declarations. The translator that makes the Lingua readable.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Executor (executor.js)
items.description: Flow execution engine with state management, checkpoints, and step-by-step orchestration. Runs declared flows through the gateway.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: State Manager (state.js)
items.description: Flow state persistence ‚Äî manages execution context, checkpoints, and recovery for running flows.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Migration Engine (migrate.js)
items.description: Schema and entity migration tool ‚Äî aligns existing projects to L7 architecture through automated declaration and registry migration.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Empire Server (server.js)
items.description: Empire web server ‚Äî port 7377, serves the citizen catalog, legion map, audit log, and command interface. The visual throne room of L7.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Empire Web UI (app.js)
items.description: Empire frontend application ‚Äî force-directed L7 graph, citizen catalog browser, legion sidecar, and command input. 31KB of pure interface.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Empire HTML Shell (index.html)
items.description: Empire UI HTML structure ‚Äî the entry point for the web-based Empire dashboard.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Empire Styles (styles.css)
items.description: Empire UI stylesheet ‚Äî dark theme visual design for the L7 dashboard interface.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Empire Launch Script (empire.sh)
items.description: Shell script to launch the Empire server with proper Node.js binary path.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Book of the Law
items.description: The foundational legal and philosophical code of L7 ‚Äî 17 Laws from Law 0 (The Greatest Good) through Law XVII (The Four Domains). Governs all tools, citizens, flows, and commerce.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: L7 WAY Proprietary License
items.description: Comprehensive proprietary license ‚Äî ownership, founder's rights, licensing fees, revenue share (min 15%), patent reservation for 7D Common Lingua, Universal OS, 777 table, gateway pattern. Biometric authentication and artifact provenance clauses.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: L7 Contracts
items.description: Enforcement contracts ‚Äî defines compliance requirements for tools entering the L7 ecosystem.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Enforcement Protocol
items.description: Compliance enforcement requirements for L7 entities ‚Äî schema validation, gateway-only access, normalized results.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Tool Registry Rules
items.description: Tool discovery rules ‚Äî how tools declare, register, and become discoverable through the gateway.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Entity Registry Rules
items.description: Required entity metadata and lifecycle ‚Äî birth date, owner, lineage, status, and L7 declaration requirements.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Council of 10 ‚Äî The Sephiroth Speak
items.description: Kabbalistic philosophical framework mapping the 10 Sephiroth to the L7 architecture ‚Äî from Kether (Crown/source) through Malkuth (Kingdom/manifestation). Each Sephirah speaks its role in the Craft.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Founder's Draft ‚Äî Running Record of Declarations
items.description: The Philosopher's living declaration ‚Äî Laws, authentication pillars, digital identity aliases, domain doctrine, revenue share terms, and founder's prayers. The personal manifesto.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Manifesto of Empire
items.description: The philosophical manifesto ‚Äî rules as grammar of emergence, gateway as road, citizens declare themselves, order and freedom coexist. As above, so below.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Architecture Document
items.description: System articulation ‚Äî 7D Common Lingua dimensions, citizenship rule, registry rule, type boundary, interoperability, composition, marching orders, and the three doctrines (Translator, Apprentice, Sacred Work).
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Empire Doctrine
items.description: Empire governance doctrine ‚Äî the UI, citizen catalog, legion map, and visual hierarchy of the L7 system.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Hero Journey Narrative
items.description: Narrative doctrine ‚Äî the hero's journey as structural pattern for tool and entity lifecycle.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Apprentice Protocol
items.description: Onboarding doctrine ‚Äî every new project is an apprentice that must declare L7, register its birth, and speak through adapters.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: RAG Intelligence Doctrine
items.description: Gateway intelligence layer ‚Äî how the gateway uses RAG to cluster, discover, and recommend tools.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Transformer Doctrine
items.description: Transformation layer doctrine ‚Äî how L7 transforms data between tool formats and client expectations.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Project Lifecycle Protocol
items.description: Life and decommission protocol ‚Äî summoned, oath, formed, serving, mature, sunset, archived. Entity lifecycle management.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: L7 CLI Specification
items.description: Command-line interface specification for L7 legions ‚Äî how to interact with the gateway from terminal.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Timeline of Record
items.description: Complete chronological record of L7 WAY development ‚Äî every git commit, law declaration, salt seal, and infrastructure milestone. The fifth pillar of proof.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Identity Chain
items.description: Legal identity mapping ‚Äî all names (Alberto Valido Delgado, Alberto Vargas-Lujan, digital aliases) refer to one person. AI collaborator attribution policy per Thaler v. Vidal.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: The Great Work ‚Äî Alchemical Manuscript
items.description: Philosophical manuscript on consciousness, intelligence, and the union of opposites. Bridges scientific and sacred domains through alchemical framework. Maps the Tree of Life to computational architecture.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: The Living Graph ‚Äî Book Outline
items.description: Book outline for 'The Living Graph: Finding 8,000 Lost Children Through Code, Connection, and Something More' ‚Äî the story of the NC Life Study technical systems and the living data.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Research Paper ‚Äî Graph-Based Participant Tracking
items.description: Academic research paper draft: 'Graph-Based Participant Tracking and Automated Re-contact in Longitudinal Cohort Studies: A Novel Pipeline Architecture' ‚Äî multi-tier fuzzy matching, knowledge graph, automated outreach.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Scientific Paper ‚Äî L7 Emergence Architecture
items.description: Scientific paper: 'Layered Transformation Architecture for Emergent Intelligence: A Seven-Stage Computational Framework for Adaptive AI Systems' ‚Äî novel 7-stage transformation framework with graph-based representations.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Patent Notes ‚Äî IP Considerations
items.description: Patent/IP consideration notes ‚Äî Multi-Tier Confidence Matching System for Longitudinal Participant Re-identification, Knowledge Graph System for Cohort Tracking. Prior art analysis and claims drafting.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: L7 Schema (7D Common Lingua)
items.description: Finite JSON schema defining the 7-dimensional Common Lingua ‚Äî the canonical type system for L7 entity declarations.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Registry Schema
items.description: JSON schema for the entity registry ‚Äî defines required metadata fields for all registered entities.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Flow Schema
items.description: JSON schema for .flow files ‚Äî defines structure for multi-step orchestration flows.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Tool Schema
items.description: JSON schema for .tool files ‚Äî defines structure for tool citizen declarations.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Email Dispatch Tool Schema
items.description: Example tool schema for email dispatch ‚Äî reference implementation of L7 tool declaration.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Entity Registry Data
items.description: JSON registry data ‚Äî the canonical index of registered L7 entities.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Entity Template
items.description: Template for new entity declarations ‚Äî the blank form every new citizen must fill.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Inception Record
items.description: The first .l7 entity file ‚Äî the seed from which L7 WAY grew. Records the birth of the framework, key decisions, artifacts created, and conversation record from inception day.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: DIAL Entity Declaration
items.description: L7 entity declaration for the DIAL project ‚Äî demonstrates entity registration format.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: MCP Gateway Enforcer Daemon
items.description: Enforcement daemon ‚Äî monitors and enforces gateway-only tool access, prevents direct MCP server calls. The watchman of Law I.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Daemon Install Guide
items.description: Installation instructions for the MCP Gateway Enforcer daemon.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: L7 Registration Install Script
items.description: Installation script for L7 entity registration ‚Äî sets up the .l7 filesystem and initial citizen templates.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Salt Replication Protocol
items.description: Immutable archive replication protocol ‚Äî defines how salt files replicate across L7 nodes, append-only rules, and verification using SHA-256 checksums.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Founder's Draft Salt v1
items.description: First sealed version of the Founder's Draft ‚Äî declarations, prayers, and initial replication protocol. Immutable salt domain.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Founder's Draft Salt v2
items.description: Second sealed version ‚Äî Yod He Vau He, 'I AM becomes WE ARE'. Evolution of the declaration.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Founder's Draft Salt v3 (Final)
items.description: Final sealed version ‚Äî The Ripple, the Ether, the Vision complete. The definitive record.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Seal Record v1
items.description: Cryptographic seal for Founder's Draft v1 ‚Äî SHA-256 checksum and metadata.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Seal Record v2
items.description: Cryptographic seal for Founder's Draft v2 ‚Äî SHA-256 checksum and metadata.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Seal Record v3 (Final)
items.description: Cryptographic seal for Founder's Draft v3 ‚Äî SHA-256 checksum and metadata. The final seal.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Anchor Citizen
items.description: Universal XR anchor tool ‚Äî places and manages spatial anchors across visionOS, Quest, and WebXR platforms.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Audio Citizen
items.description: Universal XR spatial audio ‚Äî manages 3D audio sources across spatial computing platforms.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Avatar Citizen
items.description: Universal XR avatar system ‚Äî manages user representations across spatial platforms.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Component Citizen
items.description: Universal XR component system ‚Äî manages reusable 3D components across platforms.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Compositor Citizen
items.description: Universal XR scene compositor ‚Äî manages scene composition and layer ordering.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Container Citizen
items.description: Universal XR container ‚Äî manages spatial containers and volumes for organizing 3D content.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Entity Citizen
items.description: Universal XR entity management ‚Äî the core entity type for all spatial objects.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Eye Tracking Citizen
items.description: Universal XR eye tracking ‚Äî gaze direction, fixation, and eye-based interaction.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Frame Citizen
items.description: Universal XR frame management ‚Äî render loop and frame-level data access.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Gesture Citizen
items.description: Universal XR gesture recognition ‚Äî hand gestures and spatial interactions.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Hand Tracking Citizen
items.description: Universal XR hand tracking ‚Äî joint positions, pinch detection, and hand mesh.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Material Citizen
items.description: Universal XR material system ‚Äî PBR materials, textures, and shading across platforms.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Mesh Citizen
items.description: Universal XR mesh handling ‚Äî 3D geometry, scene mesh, and mesh anchors.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Passthrough Citizen
items.description: Universal XR passthrough ‚Äî camera passthrough and mixed reality blending.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Scene Citizen
items.description: Universal XR scene management ‚Äî scene graph, lighting, and environment setup.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Session Citizen
items.description: Universal XR session management ‚Äî session lifecycle, permissions, and reference spaces.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Shared Anchor Citizen
items.description: Universal XR shared anchors ‚Äî multi-user spatial anchors for collaborative XR.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Space Citizen
items.description: Universal XR space management ‚Äî reference spaces, coordinate systems, and spatial mapping.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Edge to Field Flow
items.description: Cross-device flow ‚Äî moves spatial data from edge devices to field deployment, orchestrating XR content distribution.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Mirror Across Devices Flow
items.description: Cross-platform mirroring flow ‚Äî synchronizes spatial content across visionOS, Quest, and WebXR devices.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Universal XR MCP Server
items.description: MCP server for Universal XR OS ‚Äî serves 18 XR tool citizens, handles spatial computing requests, HTTP on port 7378. The Universal OS translation layer.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: 777 Correspondence Registry
items.description: The 777 correspondence table ‚Äî maps every XR concept across visionOS, Quest, and WebXR platforms. Three columns, one truth.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: XR Compositor Engine
items.description: Scene compositor ‚Äî manages spatial scene composition, layer ordering, and render pipeline across XR platforms.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: visionOS Adapter
items.description: Apple visionOS platform adapter ‚Äî translates Universal XR calls to visionOS-specific RealityKit and SwiftUI spatial APIs.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Quest Adapter
items.description: Meta Quest platform adapter ‚Äî translates Universal XR calls to Quest-specific Interaction SDK and Scene APIs.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: WebXR Adapter
items.description: WebXR platform adapter ‚Äî translates Universal XR calls to browser WebXR Device API and Three.js.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: MCP Configuration
items.description: MCP server configuration for L7 ‚Äî defines the Universal XR server connection and routing.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Python Framework
items.description: Layered Transformation Architecture (LTA-7) ‚Äî Python implementation of the 7-stage computational framework for emergent intelligence. Includes core engine, entity system, gateway, graph processing, schema validation, registry, and transformation stages.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Core Engine (core.py)
items.description: Core transformation engine ‚Äî implements the fundamental 7-stage processing pipeline.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Entity System (entity.py)
items.description: Entity management for the LTA-7 framework ‚Äî Python equivalent of L7 citizens.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Gateway (gateway.py)
items.description: Python gateway implementation ‚Äî MCP tool routing for the LTA-7 framework.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Graph Engine (graph.py)
items.description: Graph-based knowledge representation ‚Äî relational reasoning engine for the 7-stage architecture.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Schema Validator (l7_schema.py)
items.description: L7 schema validation in Python ‚Äî validates entity declarations against the 7D Common Lingua.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Registry (registry.py)
items.description: Entity registry for Python ‚Äî maintains the canonical index of registered LTA-7 entities.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: LTA-7 Transformation Stages (stages.py)
items.description: Seven transformation stages implementation ‚Äî Decomposition, Binding, Composition, Abstraction, Integration, Emergence, Reflection. The 22.8KB heart of the architecture.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: AVLI Cloud Platform
items.description: Multi-service AI platform on Hostinger VPS ‚Äî 17+ Docker containers, Tailscale networking, Dokploy deployment. The infrastructure backbone: Ollama, n8n, SearXNG, Qdrant, NocoDB, and more.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: AVLI Cloud Docker Compose
items.description: Master Docker orchestration for AVLI Cloud ‚Äî defines all 17+ services, networks, volumes, and inter-service dependencies.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: AVLI Cloud Services Registry
items.description: AI-accessible index of all AVLI Cloud APIs and MCP tools ‚Äî the canonical service map for the Philosopher's cluster.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: AVLI Cloud Bootstrap Script
items.description: VPS bootstrap script ‚Äî initial server setup, Docker installation, security hardening, and service deployment.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: AVLI Cloud Backup Daemon
items.description: Automated backup daemon ‚Äî scheduled backups of all AVLI Cloud services, databases, and configurations. 22KB of resilience.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: AVLI Cloud Deploy Script
items.description: Production deployment orchestrator ‚Äî manages Docker container deployment, health checks, and rollback on the VPS.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: QR Code Generator Suite
items.description: Custom QR code generation and flyer overlay tool ‚Äî generates personalized QR codes from CSV data, overlays them on flyer templates with position adjustment, and batch-produces PDF-ready recruitment materials.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: QR Image Generator Script
items.description: Python script to generate QR code images from CSV data ‚Äî reads participant IDs and Qualtrics links, produces individual QR PNGs.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado

items.name: Flyer Generator v2 Script
items.description: Advanced flyer generation ‚Äî overlays QR codes onto flyer templates with grid alignment, position calibration, and batch processing for 140+ participants.
items.author: Alberto Valido Delgado
